title: Manage Turf for Game Day
description: A groundskeeper needs to ensure the stadium's natural grass field is in optimal condition for an upcoming game.

tasks.description: Retrieve data from in-ground sensors on soil moisture and temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a report showing that parts of the field are too dry.
Agent confirms no rain is expected before the game.

tasks.description: Activate the sprinkler system for specific zones of the field to reach the optimal moisture level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs a targeted watering cycle.
